channel.title: Craft on GDLP
channel.description: Recent content in Craft on GDLP

item.title: made another Downpour-thing ☔️
item.description: I’ve been knitting for almost a year and I basically knit every day now. My camera roll is full of pictures of yarn, work-in-progress shots, my dress form. I thought it would be nice to make another Downpour, this time recording my knits. This is not work-related but I dunno, I like using this website to signal: I’m still alive. https://downpour.games/~gdlp/tejidos https://downpour.games/~gdlp/tejidos https://downpour.games/~gdlp/tejidos tejidos because I’m learning Spanish again this year
